code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignIn=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const{setToken,setUserId}=useAuth();const handleSignIn=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("/api/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(data.error)throw new Error(data.error);localStorage.setItem("access_token",data.token);localStorage.setItem("user_id",data.userId);setToken(data.token);setUserId(data.userId);setError("");navigate('/');}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"Form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",onClick:handleSignIn,children:"Sign In"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error})]});};export default SignIn;
